creator: Covve Visual Network Limited
descriptionHtml:
Covve is designed to help you better manage relationships and create business opportunities. It’s your AI-powered contacts manager, helping you stay in touch, grow and leverage your network.

* Best contacts app – Tom’s Guide 2019
* Best address book app for Android – BestTechie
* Winner of T-Mobile & Nokia Program “disrupting the future of communications”

Here is what you will love about Covve:

Know everything before you call:
- Covve’s patented News Engine is constantly working for you, scanning over 100+ news sources to notify you of news affecting your contacts, their company, industry and country.

Your personal CRM:
- After your call, keep notes from your discussion and add a reminder for a follow-up.

Stay in touch with smart reminders:
- Covve let’s you know when is the right time to reach out and notifies you when you are losing touch.

Scan your business cards:
- Covve’s AI-powered business card scanner is language agnostic and tuned for maximum accuracy.

Go paperless:
- Create and share your electronic business card and keep a log of who you met.

Keep your data private and safe:
- Covve has been designed with privacy and security as a priority - https://covve.com/privacy

Covve is a free service. Advanced users can access specialized functionality by subscribing to a Pro account. You can get your Covve Pro subscription through the app for $14.99 (monthly) or $89.99 (discounted annual). Prices may vary depending on country; you’ll see the price before completing payment.

Covve's privacy policy and terms of use can be found at https://covve.com/terms
We are always here to help, on support@covve.com
descriptionShort: #1 address book. Sync & backup your phonebook contacts, scan business cards

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Say hi to Contact News, one of our most powerful features ever!
Contact News, gives you instant news and dynamic info on a contact, so you know everything you should know before making that call.

Their company’s just made a major announcement? Contact News has you covered!
Election results in their country? Covered!
New regulation in their industry? Ditto.

Forget all the Google searches and all the research, all you need to do is tap on the contact and browse their News feed.

descriptionShort: #1 address book. Sync & backup your phonebook contacts, scan business cards

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Still handing out paper business cards in 2020? Want an extremely well styled, personalized, high definition digital one? Well, you now have one, in Covve!

With so many of our meetings having moved online, the timing has never been better to go digital. What’s more, with 100 billion business cards printed every year, you are joining the many of us working to minimize paper waste.

With different designs and colors to choose from, it's as a pleasure to design as it is to share.

descriptionShort: #1 address book. Sync & backup your phonebook contacts, scan business cards

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Introducing Covve’s brand new News Stories. Covve searches the world’s news for articles relating to your contacts and lets you know when there’s news about their company, their country or industry.

It’s the easiest way to keep up to date with your contacts and gives you the perfect excuse to call them!

v15.1 brings a number of optimizations to Covve's News and some bug fixes across the app.

title: Covve: Intelligent address book

creator: Covve Visual Network Limited
descriptionHtml:
Covve is designed to help you better manage relationships and create business opportunities. It’s your AI-powered contacts manager, helping you stay in touch, grow and leverage your network.

* Best contacts app – Tom’s Guide 2020
* Best address book app for Android – BestTechie
* Winner of T-Mobile & Nokia Program “disrupting the future of communications”

Here is what you will love about Covve:

Know everything before you call:
- Covve’s patented News Engine is constantly working for you, scanning over 100+ news sources to notify you of news affecting your contacts, their company, industry and country.

Stay in touch with smart reminders:
- Covve let’s you know when is the right time to reach out and notifies you when you are losing touch.

Go paperless, stay safe:
- Create and share your digital business card, contactless, paperless, seamless.

Scan business cards:
- Covve’s AI-powered business card scanner is language agnostic and tuned for maximum accuracy.

Your personal CRM:
- After your call, keep notes from your discussion and add a reminder to follow-up.

Organize your contacts:
- Create lists, use Covve’s search and smart tags and quickly find who you need.

Keep your data private and safe:
- Covve has been designed with privacy and security as a priority - https://covve.com/privacy

Covve is a free service. Advanced users can access specialized functionality by subscribing to a Pro account. You can get your Covve Pro subscription through the app for $14.99 (monthly) or $89.99 (discounted annual). Prices may vary depending on country; you’ll see the price before completing payment.

Covve's privacy policy and terms of use can be found at https://covve.com/terms
We are always here to help, on support@covve.com

descriptionShort: Nurture your relationships with this AI powered contacts app

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
InTouch 2: Covve's intelligent relationship management engine, just got much smarter!

InTouch 2 brings a suite of tools to help you level up your relationship management game:
- Never miss an important date with support for birthdays and special dates.
- Pro users can tailor their InTouch to their needs with advanced and custom auto reminder frequencies.
- Suggested auto reminders. If you haven't had time to set auto reminders yet, Covve's InTouch engine will suggest auto reminders for you.

title: Covve: Stay in Touch

creator: Covve Visual Network Limited
descriptionHtml:
Covve is designed to help you better manage relationships and create business opportunities. It’s your AI-powered contacts manager, helping you stay in touch, grow and leverage your network.

* Best contacts app – Tom’s Guide 2021
* Best address book app for Android – BestTechie
* Winner of T-Mobile & Nokia Program “disrupting the future of communications”

Here is what you will love about Covve:

Stay in touch with smart reminders:
- Covve's powerful InTouch Engine let’s you know when is the right time to reach out and reminds you when you are losing touch, so you never let a relationship go cold.

Know everything before you call:
- Covve’s patented News Engine is constantly working for you, scanning over 100+ news sources to notify you of news affecting your contacts, their company, industry and country, so you are always up to date.

Your personal CRM:
- After your call, keep notes from your discussion and add reminders to follow-up. A powerful relationship manager, tracker and mobile CRM, all in one simple to use app.

Organize your contacts:
- Use Covve’s search and smart tags and quickly find who you need. Export your contacts to Excel/CSV for further processing.

Scan business cards:
- Covve’s AI-powered business card scanner is language agnostic and tuned for maximum accuracy so you can quickly and easily digitize all your business cards.

Go paperless, stay safe:
- Create and share your digital business card at a tap of a button.

Keep your data private and safe
- Covve backups up your contacts daily so you never have to worry again.
- Covve has been designed with privacy and security as a priority: https://covve.com/privacy

Covve is a free service. Advanced users can access specialized functionality by subscribing to a Pro account. title:

27.3.2

creator: Covve Visual Network Limited
descriptionHtml:
Covve’s Networking Companion personal CRM app helps you easily manage both professional and personal relationships. Scan business cards, set follow-up reminders, and keep notes on your contacts while staying updated on their latest news.

▶ Fast Business Card Scanning ◀
• Instantly scan and save business cards with fast, accurate results.

▶ Personalized Digital Business Card ◀
• Create and share your own digital business card and share it easily, even through a widget.

▶ Smart Reminders ◀
• Get automatic reminders to follow up and stay in touch, with enhanced filters and multi-select options for easy management.

▶ Keep Personal Notes ◀
• Add notes about your contacts and group interactions, all viewable in the "Recent" section.

▶ Track Your Interactions ◀
• Monitor your weekly and monthly networking activity with easy-to-read stats, including details on every card exchange.

▶ Stay Updated ◀
• Get news about your contacts' careers and interests before you reach out.

▶ Organize with Tags ◀
• Easily organize your contacts with tags for quick access.

▶ On-device end-to-end encryption ◀
• Your notes and contacts are fully encrypted on your device with end-to-end encryption, ensuring only you have access. Even we can’t unlock your data without your encryption key.

▶ Your AI Assistant ◀
• Offload data entry with your AI assistant, available 24/7 via email.

▶ Recognized as a leader in networking apps ◀

• "A simple yet state-of-the-art app that will revolutionize your business relationships like you've never seen" – Inc

• "Best contacts app" – Tom’s Guide 2023

• "Best address book app for iPhone" – NewsExaminer

• Winner of T-Mobile & Nokia Program "disrupting the future of communications"

Why Covve? Covve makes networking simple, efficient, and secure, helping you build and maintain relationships with ease. Download Covve today and simplify your networking!

For any assistance, our support team is always ready to help at support@covve.com

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Get ready for a major milestone in privacy! v29 brings end-to-end encryption, the gold standard in privacy, to your data. From notes and interactions to reminders and family info—everything is now encrypted directly on your device.

This is a huge leap forward in protecting your sensitive information, giving you complete peace of mind. Don’t forget to save your unique encryption key when you update. Only you have access to it, not even Covve can recover it for you!
